definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Reliability is poor and precision is not high while using traditional differential pressure densimeter .
sentences.chinese: 传统的泥浆池差压式密度计可靠性差，精度不高。

sentences.english: Densitometry was used to calculate peak particle diameters.
sentences.chinese: 使用密度计去推算粒孚的最大直径。

sentences.english: Most of the diver can also display other derived data .
sentences.chinese: 大多数的密度计还可以显示其他派生出来的数据。

sentences.english: Densitometers are used in photographic reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 光密度计用在复制照片的过程中。

sentences.english: The second type of instrument is a reflex densitometer .
sentences.chinese: 第二栽仪器是不正射密度计。

sentences.english: Mass flow information can be secured by using a densitometer .
sentences.chinese: 质量流量的数据可借助于密度计而获得。

sentences.english: On-Line measurement of solid content in aluminium hydroxide slurry by isotopic densitometer.
sentences.chinese: 应用同位素密度计在线测量氢氧化铝料浆的固体含量。
